answerText: stress [10] On a stress-strain curve, this point is the greatest stress a material can endure before its cross-section decreases and it fractures.

subject: Science
question: Question: The shear form of this force occurs parallel to a material's surface. For 10 points each: [10] Name this type of force, given in units of Newtons per square meter, typically plotted against strain on certain curves.
